thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com
thread.title: Susy
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Susy

author: Susy
title: Susy
text: Great Deal, Quality Product, and over the top customer service and tech support. Very helpful with all my questions. Tech support was extremely knowledgeable and has Great communication skills. Highly recommended. I will only shop here for my heating and cooling needs. No answering machines when I called only real live people was Wonderful!!!
